data.title: New England Botanic Garden at Tower Hill
data.meta_description: Visit New England Botanic Garden at Tower Hill today! Open to the public year-round for garden viewing, trail walking, and opportunities.
data.meta_site_name: New England Botanic Garden at Tower Hill
data.text:
Welcome to New England Botanic Garden at Tower Hill!

Experience the wonder of plants at a botanic garden in the heart of New England. We are a nonprofit organization open to the public year-round for garden viewing, trail walking, educational programs, exhibitions, and more. Our garden includes conservatories, formal and naturalistic gardens, a Garden Shop, café, and expansive views of the Wachusett Reservoir. We care for an irreplaceable collection of plants and place sustainability and environmental stewardship at the forefront of our work. Here, wandering is always welcome, and no two visits will ever be the same.

We’re excited to announce the news that the Garden has launched a formal affiliation with leading international and national environmental organizations, the U.S. branch of Botanic Gardens Conservation International (BGCI-US) and the Ecological Landscape Alliance (ELA). Plant conservation, research, and ecological horticulture are at the center of this new partnership.

Looking to learn more? Explore our FAQs or check out our latest blog post.

SUMMER EVENINGS: Extended Hours

Wednesdays, July 3 – September 4

Thursdays June 20 – August

Make the most of the season’s long days and beautiful twilights with golden hour experiences at the Garden.

Learn more.

PLAN YOUR SPECIAL DAY WITH US

Whatever your occasion may be, the Garden provides a picturesque environment that your guests will talk about for years to come.
